body_html: Beware that tf.metrics.accuracy is computed over an entire session run, not per batch. I just kicked it out because I did not get the utility of it. Instead, I'm doing the same thing as you with reduce_mean to have batch accuracy.
body_text: Beware that tf.metrics.accuracy is computed over an entire session run, not per batch. I just kicked it out because I did not get the utility of it. Instead, I'm doing the same thing as you with reduce_mean to have batch accuracy.
body: Beware that tf.metrics.accuracy is computed over an entire session run, not per batch. I just kicked it out because I did not get the utility of it. Instead, I'm doing the same thing as you with reduce_mean to have batch accuracy.
